name: Scary Robots
description:
A creepy robotic ballistic-shooter where shots take time to reach their targets, and gravity effects their flight. It controls like a FPS, with nifty jump-jets, in a low-g place.

http://jph_wacheski.itch.io/

The first playable area is a Metallic Forest with oddly pixelated rolling hills and Scary Red Robots to harvest for Dark Metal. The first resource Dark Metal will be needed to travel to other areas,. . currently there are 5 different stages to play through in this procedural forest.

Development "on hold" pending more free time or development support of $ for encouragement (i.e. beer/food).

The option menu items are not yet functioning (or needed) however the Sound Effect bBox is implemented, and some fun to mess around with ;)

Here are some of the music parts (these are still in development like the rest of the game);
